amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Environmental Restoration Army, by $1 million and increases funding for Defense Health Care for PTSD by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Environmental Restoration Army, by $1 million and increase funding for Defense Health Care for PTSD by a similar amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A017) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
